dialog: Hello Bevny. I hope those rascals at the Cooper household are not causing you discomfort.
I do wish you wouldn't go there, as your mother has untoward feelings towards Mr Cooper.
Sorry, I should not let my emotions out. You should keep the lion within his cage.
Hopefully mother will be home early enough to pick you up this time.
We are even unsafe in these gilded streets, with [THE INDIVIDUAL] roaming around...
Just look at the Pelagati house....
Anyway, Love you Bevny. Call me soon, it's Dad
